mapper.sql: table_id, `table_name`,table_code,func_code, company_id, is_system_define, is_enable, sort, creator_id, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.insert:
insert into t_custom_archive_table
`table_name`,
table_code,
company_id,
func_code,
is_system_define,
is_enable,
sort,
creator_id,
create_time,
update_time,
is_delete,
#{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{funcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isSystemDefine,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

mapper.update:
update t_custom_archive_table
`table_name` = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_code = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
func_code = #{funcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_system_define = #{isSystemDefine,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_custom_archive_table set `table_name` = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_code = #{tableCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where table_id = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select MAX(table_id) from t_custom_archive_table where is_delete=0
mapper.update: update t_custom_archive_table set is_delete = 1 where table_id in #{item}
mapper.select:
select
from t_custom_archive_table where is_delete=0 AND company_id=#{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select table_id from t_custom_archive_table where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_delete=0 AND (func_code="ARC" or func_code="PRE")
select is_system_define from t_custom_archive_table where table_id=#{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_delete=0
select `table_name` from t_custom_archive_table where table_id=#{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_delete=0
select func_code from t_custom_archive_table where table_id=#{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_delete=0
select table_id from t_custom_archive_table where company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_system_define=0 AND func_code=#{archive,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_delete=0
select `table_name` from t_custom_archive_table where is_delete=0 AND company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select is_system_define,func_code form t_custom_archive_table where table_id=#{tableId} and is_delete=0 and is_enable=1

select field.field_id,sort.sort from t_custom_archive_field field left join t_query_scheme_sort sort on sort.field_id=field.field_id left join t_query_scheme sche on sche.query_scheme_id=sort.query_scheme_id where sche.query_scheme_id=#{schemeId} and field.is_delete=0 and sche.is_delete=0

select field_id from t_custom_archive_field field left join t_custom_archive_table tab on tab.table_id=field.field_id where tab.is_enable=1 and tab.is_delete=0 and tab.func_code="ARC" AND tab.company_id=#{companyId} and tab.is_system_define=0
